title: About
text:
This is a simple quarto project. It was designed and built by Eric.
The challenge I faced in using Quarto is the need to render daily in order to make use of today’s date within the calculations. This has now been automated by making use of GitHub Actions to render daily.
Previously, Eric built a site with Shiny:

HappyPhil

As Eric rapidly approaches retirement, he no longer has the patience for Shiny.

title: HappyEric
text:
This page is a celebration of Eric. And what makes him very happy: RETIREMENT!
Eric’s last working day was August 2, 2024.


Today is February 27, 2025. Eric has already been retired 209 days.
